page.title: 20 Transport & Communications.
page.content: The main disadvantage of living in this area is the lack of public transport.Midland Fox ran a Saturday service to Welford for a trial period this has now ceased.The only buses through the villages are those taking pupils to school at Kibworth and Market Harborough.Primary school children travel by Smiths coach to their swimming lessons in Market Harborough.Other journeys are by private car.No families are without a car;over half own at least 2,some own 3 or more.There are also tractors, vans and 2 or 3 motor bikes. There are direct{rail links}to London and the north from Market Harborough and Rugby.The nearest{airport}is at Castle Donington.Mowsley has 1{public {telephone box}as has Laughton.Most homes have a telephone,the exchange being at Leicester.
